column1: Isolation and Sequencing of DNA Marinobacter and Arcobacter genomic DNA was extracted using Qiagen DNA extraction kits ( Qiagen DNA minikit and Qiagen DNeasy kit, respectively) ( Hilden, Germany) as previously described ( Panescu et al., 2018; Tummings et al., 2018).
